revised_title: On the Resistance of Fluids to Boats: A New Method for Measuring Resistance
tldr: The author presents a new method for measuring the resistance of fluids to boats, using a spring weighing-machine and a reel system to record the strain on the boat at different velocities. The experiments were conducted in the East India Import Dock, and the results provide a more accurate measure of resistance, accounting for factors such as friction and the internal motion of the fluid.
